q: Page "in my clear opinion, is ready to lead." Sergey Brin will continue to focus on technology products, assuming the title of co-founder as opposed to his current role of president, technology. He's an innovator and entrepreneur to the core, and this role suits him perfectly, Eric Schmidt wrote in his post. "As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. Regis Philbin is well-suited to daytime TV, says David Letterman Scardino of ad firm RPA in Los Angeles. He could be outrageous, but in a way that was non-threatening. And that's a great combination for the daytime. Live could see some viewer turnover after his exit. We found two of the eight missing artifacts outside the museum between a government building that got burned and the gift shop. We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters. The 76ers won the best-of-five series from Orlando, 3-1, and will meet the Indiana Pacers in the second round, beginning Monday in Indianapolis. I don't know how you can be any more proud of your team, J'Covan Brown said. "I told them this was a great opportunity for us to grow up. Allen Iverson 's doing what great players do. She'd never served in a George H.W. Bush administration position, he said. "She'd been an academic. And, you know, a lot of academics like to have meetings. And they like to bridge differences and get people all to be happy."

A political scientist from Northern Kentucky University says Governor Ernie Fletcher appears to be in a whole lot of trouble with six weeks to go before Election Day. Dr. John Michael Vick Baranowski points to multiple polls showing Democrat Steve Beshear with double-digit leads. Next up, Jaime Anderson tells me, they'll be making-over a pit bull in the wake of perpetually gauche Dwaine Caraway 's weekend spent buddying up to noted animal abuser and convicted felon Michael Vick . She writes: This will be more of an "image' makeover, but we plan to parade a pit around in a pink tutu and show how "vicious' they really are( not)! Rescuers and shelter folks can head over to the Facebook page if they"d like to get their pups spruced up. If videos of rehabilitated dogs make your heart go pitter-patter, mark your calendars
